title: £145.00 pw-Studio in Carleton Road, Camden, N7 Ref: 110
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Carleton Road, Camden, N7
£145.00 Per Week
Ref: 110

Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright double bedsit apartment in Carleton Road, Camden, N7

The Property Consists Of:
*Beautifully presented and bright large double bedsit
*The bedsit is newly refurbished with open plan with a fitted kitchen and shared bathroom
The flats is offered in good condition and within a short walk of Tufnell Park Tube ( Northern Line ) and all the local amenities offered by Holloway Road.
*The property are within easy commute of central London, the West End.
*The rent includes gs and water rates
